BEFORE:
x = self.layer4(x)

        x = self.avgpool(x)
        x = x.view(x.size(0), -1)
        x = self.fc(x)

        return x
AFTER:
x = self.maxpool(x)
        
        out = [x]

        x = self.layer1(x)
        out.append(x)
        x = self.layer2(x)
        out.append(x)
        x = self.layer3(x)
        out.append(x)
        x = self.layer4(x)
        out.append(x)

        # x = self.avgpool(x)
        # x = x.view(x.size(0), -1)
        # x = self.fc(x)

        return out
